DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate wether measure stroke volume ( SV ) variation impedance cardiography passive leg raise ( PLR ) reliably predict preload dependency cardiac surgery , comparison reference parameter : velocity time integral ( VTI ) variation measure transthoracical echocardiography .
DOC.brief_title: Preload Dependency Impedance Cardiography After Cardiac Surgery
